title: Joy Division - Complete Studio Recordings MRB-001 v1 (2014) [FLA
description:
JOY DIVISION

COMPLETE STUDIO RECORDINGS
(MRB-001 v1)



IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve tried to compile all the Joy Division studio recordings from the best available sources. THIS MEANS the japanese box set, some singles -and a bootleg- vinyl rips, the Analog Loyalist remasters, etc. Only 3 tracks were taken from the Heart and Soul box. 

This release is ordered by session with all its notes about the producer, place, recording dates, tracks, sources for each track and general notes.

01 - The Warsaw demo session (1977-07-18)
02 - An Ideal For Living EP (1977-12-xx)
03 - Unreleased Album RCA demo (1978-05-03)
04 - A Factory Sample (1978-10-11)
05 - First John Peel session (1979-01-31)
06 - Genetic Records demo session (1979-03-04)
07 - Unknown Pleasures sessions (1979-04-xx)
08 - Piccadilly Radio session (1979-06-04)
09 - Transmission session I (1979-07-xx)
10 - Transmission session II (1979-07-28 to 1979-08-04)
11 - Second John Peel session (1979-11-26)
12 - Sordide Sentimental session (1979-10-xx to 1979-11-xx)
13 - Love Will Tear Us Apart session I (1980-01-08)
14 - Love Will Tear Us Apart session II (1980-03-xx)
15 - Closer sessions (1980-03-18 to 1980-03-30)

BONUS
1977-10-29 - Live at the Electric Circus, Collyhurst, Manchester
1979-09-15 - BBC TV Studios (Something Else, BBC 2)
1979-09-31 - Rock On, Radio 1 (Interview)
1980-05-14 - Graveyard Studios


Marabalos. Jan. 2014.-
